title: Closing Thunderbird from Bash
content:
I am building a script to backup /home/username/.thunderbird folder every night, and I want to make sure that Thunderbird is not running while the backup is performed, and if it's running the script should close (gracefully kill) Thunderbird before performing backup.

What is the recommended Bash command to gracefully kill Thunderbird without corrupting any settings/mailbox files?

Best regards,
creator: alexandru.s

title: Payment with reference ba1Cwp2MH1V017HP
content:
Hola,

En primer lugar dar gracias por hacer realidad un proyecto como Thunderbird que estoy usando desde hace más de un año para unificar en un único lugar todos mis correos electrónicos.

Les contacto porque sin permiso ni consentimiento se me ha cobrado un importe de 81,96€ con concepto "WWW.THUNDERBIRD." y referencia "ba1Cwp2MH1V017HP".

Me gustaría saber a que se debe este cobro y si es correcto y legal, me gustaría recibir una factura.

Yo tengo la sospecha de que debe estar relacionado con los complementos que he instalado de Enviar más tarde y Mail Merge.

En cualquier caso, por ningún lado he podido observar que sean extensiones de pago.

Saludos
creator: info9360

title: Suddenly none of my outgoing emails get through
content:
About two weeks ago suddenly none of my emails were being delivered (Tried sending from multiple email addresses) I didn't realise this for a while as the emails I sent did not bounce back. I have tried deleting and reinstalling the software and immediately after a test email got through. But that did not last. I have checked my outgoing mail server and it remains unaltered as mail.internode.on.net I have also tried turning off my firewall in my Norton 360 software.

I am able to send emails using internode web mail. I am using the latest version of windows 11 (64) I have been using your software for many many years and never had a problem before. I have not changed anything on my computer to cause this problem. Please help.
creator: enichols1962
